periods.name: Today
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Freezing Drizzle then Slight Chance Light Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of freezing drizzle and a slight chance of drizzle between 11am and noon, then a slight chance of snow between noon and 1pm, then a slight chance of freezing drizzle. Cloudy. High near 33, with temperatures falling to around 25 in the afternoon. North wind 2 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
